TopicTitle: Add "Show/Hide Unpurchased" button above the part list.

Articles.Content:
I don't like seeing the list cluttered with parts I can't, or wont buy yet.

Edited December 16, 2014 by Cpt. Kipard

Or you could make a new tab and name it 'Purchased' and stuff all your purchased parts there.

Hope this helped:)
No it didn't. You haven't thought this through. Why would I put all of my parts under one tab? That's even worse.
